name: Azalea (Portakalo)
description:
Made in Unity by Dilan Alpay, Eric Elias, Jasmine Shah, and Jess Sullivan in the week-long Game-U Summer Game Jam 2022 with the theme "A Different Kind of Combat".

Zinnia wants to help get her pal Azalea a nice pot of griffin noodle soup, and she'll need the help of her bouncy companion Blub to get all of the ingredients. Use the mouse to pull back and fling Blub at your enemies. But make sure you're also fast enough to catch him as he bounces around the stage!

With multiple enemy types, four levels, boss fights, and an array of fun characters to talk to, Azalea is a short story about friendship packed with heart and made with Blub!

CONTROLS

  • Move - WASD
  • Throw Blub - Click, pull back like a pinball machine, release!
  • Interact with NPCs - E 
  • Pause - Esc
